name: Catea Party
description:
After finding a random café and meeting the Happy Hatter, you'll be introduced to foods from different cultures like Korean street egg sandwiches to Japanese sweet potato cheesecake. Race against time to collect the correct ingredients to cook the dish and experience trading cultures through the art of cooking!

This is a submission for Cozy Fall Jam 2022!

Inspired by Lilo and Stitch: 625 Sandwich Stacker ✨

Controls

Please play the game in Full Screen only!

  • Story Mode
    • Space bar --- Next Dialogue
  • Bowl
    • A --- Move left
    • D --- Move right
  • Character
    • A --- Move left
    • D --- Move right
  • View Recipes
    • A --- Move left
    • D --- Move right
    • Mouse --- Move left and right
